result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Amanda L. Schindler

records.addlTxt:
ADDRESS INFO for Amanda L. Schindler
Current: 2350 S. 23rd Street, Manitowoc, WI 54220   (Effective: 08-26-2022)
Prior: Manitowoc County Jail, Manitowoc, WI 54220

$50.00 cash bail furnished and defendant is released from custody.   
Notice to Party Furnishing Cash Bail Bond. 
--Francis Kosobucki, Jr., 2315 S. 23rd Street, Manitowoc, WI  54220.
Scheduling conference on November 16, 2022 at 09:45 am.
Further proceedings on October 7, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Order Granting Motion to Modify Bail.
It is hereby ordered that the defendant's bond is modified to $50.00 cash.  All other provisions remain the same.
AMENDED Commitment for Failure to Furnish Bail.

4:03 pm - Defendant Amanda L. Schindler appeared by video, in custody, at Manitowoc County Jail.  Attorney Marcus Lasalle Falk appeared by video for Amanda L. Schindler.  Prosecuting attorney Marconi De Franca Barros appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant waives their right to a preliminary hearing.  Defendant is bound over to Circuit Court Branch 2 for trial. Inducement contained in 09-07-22 email recommending misdemeanor disposition with no up front jail.
ARRAIGNMENT - 
Information filed.  Copy served on defense counsel.
Not guilty plea(s) entered.  Jury calendar.
BAIL MOTION - 
Parties argue the motion.  Atty. Falk recommends recognizance bond.  State objects.  Court modifies cash bail to $50.00 with the same conditions.  Atty. Falk to draft order.
Further proceedings scheduled for October 7, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Scheduling conference scheduled for November 16, 2022 at 09:45 am.

Defendant in custody.   
Defendant demands a preliminary hearing.   Preliminary hearing is set for 09-07-22 at 3:00 p.m.    
Minutes.

ADDRESS INFO for Amanda L. Schindler
Current: Manitowoc County Jail, Manitowoc, WI 54220   (Effective: 08-26-2022)
Prior: 2315 S. 23rd Street Lot 1019, Manitowoc, WI 54220

Order to Seal Probable Cause Statement.
The original document was titled: Probable cause statement /judicial determination
The original history event date is: 08-22-2022
Commitment for Failure to Furnish Bail.

BAIL HEARING - 
Defendant in custody and appearing by video from the Manitowoc County Jail.  The State informs the Court that the defendant will be charged with the crimes of 2 counts felony bail jumping and disorderly conduct-dvo.  The matters are continued for initial appearance on 08-29-22 at 1:30 p.m. Br. 2.  Bail is set at $500.00 cash with the conditions that she have no contact with Jason Tweig and have no abusive or assaultive contact with Francis Kosobucki, Jr.    Bail not furnished and defendant is remanded into custody.  Commitment for failure to furnish bail issued.  Copy filed. 
Minutes.
